item.title: Rubbish tip, 11th August
item.description:
Cups, bottles, bags and misc rubbish in a big pile near the entry to the Asda petrol station. Really unsightly. This may be private land but the landlord and local shops need to take responsibility and also start fining fly tippers.

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Smell of urine, 11th August

item.title: Massive pile of rubbish on Crawthew grove, attracting pests, 11th August
item.description:
Growing rubbish pile on Crawthew grove, attracting pests. Smells awful. Please remove asap! And discourage people from using this

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 88, Crawthew Grove, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Please water the flowers, 11th August
item.description:
You have planted hundreds/thousands of bulbs and flowers yet they are not watered. with this hot weather they are deteriorating, withering and dying. This is especiallly prevalent in the displays in Kelsey Park. If they are not attended to then their planting and subsequent enjoyment is a complete waste, thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kelsey Park Avenue, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fridge , bike and rubbish been dumped, 11th August
item.description:
Edge of wood offenham road side this has all been dumped

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Offenham Road, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Relatively young tree (10 years) needs pruning, clearing road, 11th August
item.description:
The tree outside our house (37 Highland Road) has for the first time 'blossomed'. It has dropped an enormous amount of coverage on the pavement, garden, and Highland Road. The tree requires pruning because its branches are now below head height on the pavement. Additionally, the road/pavement needs cleaning up due to being slippery, which will also block the drains.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Highland Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet
